Uhm it does not work like that. Unless you submit for re-eval and your grade changes, your provisional results will become your final results. So don't expect them to change unless you make a re-eval request.

Also what happened a few weeks ago was an exception. Grades do not usually bump up like that.

Its not the end of the world. Clear the backlogs and it will all be okay. For now, here is a cute rowlet gif to cheer you up:

![gif](giphy|Ymfp5NJGcfbP0IinZC|downsized)
